idea:
Urban Teacher is a language learning portal where we plan to cover 13 foreign languages and 7 Indian languages. We plan to make a central place to promote Indian languages on the same lines of foreign languages. India being a centre of culture and technology, along with the growing influence of foreign languages we want the youngsters to have an equal awareness of Indian languages as well as history and culture across the country. 


A deeper understanding, will arise if our local literature is promoted on the lines and with equal enthusiasm as European literature and languages. 


We plan to bring a culture of being bilingual at the same time increasing the popularity of our own languages. People often neglect our heritage in the garb of modernization, we wish you refurbish that image by providing the same level of quality as foreign languages get.
name: Urban Teacher

idea:
"Sugarshell, a lingerie brand that not only celebrates breast health, but also designs post-surgery undergarments for breast cancer patients and survivors. Our bras are designed differently for different sizes of breasts, tested on all surgery types. From asymmetrical breasts to the ones that just recovered from a surgery or those undergoing one, our bras are the answers! Made of buttery-soft fabric, this recovery bra features comfortable compression, front opening, and a wide cushioned back-bridge for added support. We know that women want to feel as normal as possible, which is why they have worked hard to create bras that look just as good as they feel—from lacy bralettes to everyday picks, and can fit her new, altered body perfectly. Worth noting that the bra has pockets that can accommodate expanders, prosthesis, or breast forms, but also lays smoothly when nothing is in the pockets. Sugarshell may have been born out of necessity, but today it gives us a reason to celebrate what makes us different. Soft on the skin, Sugarshell is the most comfortable wear one can opt for their intimate needs. True to its name, it is the “sweetest shell or the cover” for the breasts so far!!!


Dealing with cancer is a life-changing event for most people. The symptoms and side effects may take a toll on both body and mind. At this stage, one gets to decide how she wants to live the rest of her life - live with hope or hand it to destiny. For many, it can be a time to minimize regrets and make new priorities. Priorities like ditching old habits and making more healthy and informed choices. At Sugarshell, we celebrate such C- warriors and work hard to offer them a range of intimate wears that look just as good as they feel. Because we believe, post-surgery bras don't have to be ugly! We are committed to being an impactful part of women's health, long-lasting comfort, and a one-stop solution that can fit her new, altered body perfectly. With Sugarshell, redefine you and re-build confidence."
name: SUGAR SHELL BRANDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Exicom Technologies (India) LLP an Indian Company provides customised solutions in the field of covert operations, surveillance, security etc. Under Make in India initiative.

Exicom is a manufacturer of Video Airborne Downlink Equipment and Manet Mesh Data Radio. Exicom has already supplied customised Video Transmitters, Mesh Manet Radio to various security agencies including Defence. Exicom has the capability to produce customised solutions for Special Forces of Mil & Civil, Integrated surveillance solution. Video, Audio and Data based Command and Control links for land, Sea or Air (SWARM).

These are of cutting edge technologies, and will prove of a great significance at your base where high value platforms and equipment are in existence, and, above all the human lives which are priceless.
name: Exicom Technologies (India) LLP

idea: Creating a device which will Health Data Based Eco-System which will support Remote Diagnosing
name: Bardo Healthcare Tech Private Limited

idea: We are from Kartiki IT Solution Pvt.Ltd. Our company is ISO Certified 9001: 2015.We have been providing computer hardware, networking, printer and software related services
name: KARTIKI IT SOLUTION PVT.LTD

idea: Volt Automotive LLP proposes to deal in designing, manufacturing, assembling and production of electric vehicles including but not limited to two wheeler electric vehicles, providing rechargeable batteries for electric vehicles, providing service and infrastructure for charging batteries by building charging and battery swapping stations, and such other activities incidental or as may be required by the LLP for designing, manufacturing, assembling and production and providing of electric vehicles and providing rechargeable batteries to such electric vehicles for B2B and B2C businesses across India
name: VOLT AUTOMOTIVE LLP

idea:
At Aquatouch Enviro, we bring you total environment solutions - water treatment, waste water treatment & recycle, zero liquid discharge.

Specialists in water and environment management, we provide solutions across Societies, homes, communities & commercial complex. Integrating extensive process technologies, design, engineering and project management capability, we offer total solutions with single source responsibility.


We generate substantial and superior value for our customers, creating quantifiable benefits for them through our comprehensive solutions which include:

• Purifying water to ensure safe drinking water for homes and communities.

• Treating water to meet the quality requirements of any industrial process

• Removing pollutants from waste water

• Provide affordable water treatment solutions

• Treating wastewater the as per government norms & maintain healthy environment.


At Aquatouch Enviro Pvt Ltd, We believe in sustainable development.


About Us:

Directors:

Mr. Atish Kamble (Environmental Engineer)

Mr. Santosh Gaidhankar (EHS Engineer)

Mr. Subhash Thorat (Operations Engineer)


Our Services:

We are into operations-maintenance, Installation & commissioning of water treatment :

1. Sewage Treatment Plant

2. Effluent Treatment Plant

3. Reverse Osmosis

4. DM Plant

5. Swimming Pool

6. Fountain

7. OWC

8. WTP

9. Eco-friendly solutions to environmental problems
name: AQUATOUCH ENVIRO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Established in 1977, Sky Plastics and Stationery began life as a manufacturing stationery. Quickly finding success, we branched out into customized solutions, with a unique blend of design and innovation that remains our defining feature to this day. We’ve worked with some of the best known brands and create truly impactful experiences. We have a wide product assortment ranging from office stationery to paper products, ink & toner to cleaning products, from food & catering supplies to office machines and accessories.

We are proud of our unrivalled product knowledge, range and service, and our commitment to giving our customers the best of our product.
name: SKY PLASTICS & STATIONERY
